title: What I Want
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 49 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 0L
description: In the book What I Want, students will read about a girl who wants something to hug and feed. What will she get? Students will have the opportunity to identify characters as well as draw on information they already know about the topic. Detailed, supportive illustrations, repetitive sentence patterns, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers.
meta: dog, dream, feed, hug, love, play, read, something, teach, want, walk
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Identify Characters and Setting : Story elements: identify characters
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset and rime
Declarative Sentences : Recognize and locate declarative sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word with

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
